  • Element
com.xiaosfx.annotation

Annotation Type XComponent


  • @Target(value=FIELD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface XComponent
    All the GUI components that are going to be added to XLayout should have this annotation.
    Note: Containers are also considered as Components

    Visit: http://www.xiaosfx.com for more informations.
    Version:
    1.0 - October 11, 2012
    Author:
    Alex Sam Lou

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int bottom 
      int height
      This value may be invalidated if:
      ( top != XComponent.NULL ) && ( bottom != XComponent.NULL )
      int horizontalCenter
      This value may be invalidated if:
      ( left != XComponent.NULL ) || ( right != XComponent.NULL )
      int left 
      java.lang.String owner
      Default value = "".
      int right 
      int top 
      int verticalCenter
      This value may be invalidated if:
      ( top != XComponent.NULL ) || ( bottom != XComponent.NULL )
      int width
      This value may be invalidated if:
      ( left != XComponent.NULL ) && ( right != XComponent.NULL )

    • Element Detail

      • bottom

        public abstract int bottom
        Returns:
        The bottom constraint of the component.
        Default:
        -2147483648

      • height

        public abstract int height
        This value may be invalidated if:
        ( top != XComponent.NULL ) && ( bottom != XComponent.NULL )
        Returns:
        The height of the component.
        Default:
        -2147483648

      • horizontalCenter

        public abstract int horizontalCenter
        This value may be invalidated if:
        ( left != XComponent.NULL ) || ( right != XComponent.NULL )
        Returns:
        The horizontalCenter constraint of the component.
        Default:
        -2147483648

      • left

        public abstract int left
        Returns:
        The left constraint of the component.
        Default:
        -2147483648

      • owner

        public abstract java.lang.String owner
        Default value = "". If none of the containers has the same exact name, this component will not be added to the container, and therefore, it won't be displayed.

        Note: these names are Case-Sensitive.
        Returns:
        The name of the container which will contain this component.
        Default:
        ""

      • right

        public abstract int right
        Returns:
        The right constraint of the component.
        Default:
        -2147483648

      • top

        public abstract int top
        Returns:
        The top constraint of the component.
        Default:
        -2147483648

      • verticalCenter

        public abstract int verticalCenter
        This value may be invalidated if:
        ( top != XComponent.NULL ) || ( bottom != XComponent.NULL )
        Returns:
        The verticalCenter constraint of the component.
        Default:
        -2147483648

      • width

        public abstract int width
        This value may be invalidated if:
        ( left != XComponent.NULL ) && ( right != XComponent.NULL )
        Returns:
        The width of the component.
        Default:
        -2147483648
